name: Bumper Boat Battle
description:
Enjoy the thrill of bumper boats on your iPhone or iPad.

Lean your iPhone to speed up, slow down, backup, and steer. Hit other boats. As you do, they will come after you trying to get even.

Two different types of gameplay:
• 10 boat free-for-all
• buoy race (like a traditional rodeo barrel race)

Stereo sounds (with EarPods) let you hear which side of your boat another boat is. Includes impact vibration on iPhone (not available on iPad).

Universal App - supports iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad, including standard, Retina, and iPhone X displays.
